'''''Minecraft: Hello Kitty and Friends (Original Soundtrack)''''' is an extended play featuring compositions by Mike Fortu and Carlos Ramirez which consist of the songs that were released as part of the [[Hello Kitty and Friends]] DLC. It was released on January 21, 2025, the same day that the DLC was released on the [[Marketplace]].
